scripts.dr:redis: sudo docker container stop redis ; sudo docker container stop redis_insight ; sudo docker container rm redis ; sudo docker container rm redis_insight ; sudo docker compose -f ./docker/redis/compose.yml up -d && sudo docker ps
scripts.dc:es-sit: docker compose -p es-sit -f ./docker/compose-sit.yml up -d --no-deps --build && docker ps && docker system prune -f
